key_drivers: Falling real yields (10Y TIPS at 1.769%, confirmed via CNBC) primary bullish driver for gold, tech, and rate-sensitive assets
BoJ hawkish pivot (potential March hike signaled) and narrowing JPY-USD rate differential strongly bullish for 6J
Record gold ETF inflows (global AUM at all-time high $669bn) and rising geopolitical risk supporting precious metals

fallbacks_used: CNBC US10YTIP for real yields (FRED DFII10 stale as of 2026-02-20)
World Gold Council news/Seeking Alpha for gold ETF flows (WGC data requires login)
Reuters/news sources for ECB, RBA, BoJ stances
